name: com.holadivinus.blpreviewtool
description:
MarrowSDK Addon (Patch 6) that remotely loads Spawnable, Level, and Avatar data from your bonelab install / Mods.
Access the Level Loader via Stress Level Zero > Void Tools > (BLPTool) Level Loader.
Refference SLZ Materials via Stress Level Zero > Void Tools > (BLPTool) External Material Copier.
